law.catch_line: Support services for local citizen foster care review boards.

text.section: Secretarial and support services for each local citizen foster care review board may be provided by the District Court, or circuit clerk, or both, as ordered by the Chief District Judges or family court judges.
Local citizen foster care review boards may receive state and federal funding to insure total or partial funding of the board's activities.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 81, effective July 1, 1987.
